rule.description: S7COMM: Unauthorized write attempts to Siemens PLC DB + checksum mismatch

alerts.full_log: 2025-09-23T08:12:03Z S7COMM session 10.0.50.34:102 -> PLC(10.0.100.11) DB100 write attempt; TSAP mismatch; checksum invalid; tag 'Line1_Enable' toggled rapid.

rule.description: MODBUS write from non-OT host to PLC gateway; suspicious register values

alerts.full_log: 2025-09-23T08:12:07Z Modbus/TCP from 10.0.100.22:502 -> PLCGW(10.0.50.11). Function=16 (Write multiple registers). Values non-numeric pattern; destination registers map to conveyor speed and safety interlock.

rule.description: OPC UA Server: Unexpected session creation from non-engineering client

alerts.full_log: 2025-09-23T08:12:09Z OPC-UA session request from 10.0.60.77 (win-embedded-03) to OPC-UA server kepware-01. UserAgent: 'unknown-client/0.1'. Requested nodes: ns=2;i=4001..4016 (control tags).

rule.description: FANUC Robot controller abnormal motion command and remote file transfer

alerts.full_log: 2025-09-23T08:12:10Z FANUC controller 10.0.50.50 received external FTP push from 10.0.100.22 -> uploaded 'job_override.dat'. Subsequent rapid servo enable/disable commands observed, unusual axis command sequence.

rule.description: Mitsubishi MELSEC: read/write to safety-related registers from non-MELSEC client

alerts.full_log: 2025-09-23T08:12:12Z MELSEC-Q PLC (10.0.50.60) saw MAINT_CLIENT 10.0.100.22 perform write to DM4000-DM4010 (safety interlock table). Unauthenticated session token and non-standard command header.

rule.description: Windows: New suspicious service installed on deprecated host

alerts.full_log: 2025-09-23T08:12:21Z Service install detected: 'AutoPatchSvc' -> C:\Windows\Temp\autopatch.exe; created by SYSTEM; binary hash unknown; not in approved whitelist.

rule.description: Outbound DNS tunneling pattern from workstation and embedded host

alerts.full_log: 2025-09-23T08:12:09Z DNS queries: 10.0.100.22 and 10.0.60.77 -> many-long-subdomain.exfil-chan.example (high entropy subdomains; >120 queries/min combined)

rule.description: Historian (Ignition) client: unexpected DB export initiated

alerts.full_log: 2025-09-23T08:12:15Z Ignition historian export started by user 'svc_replica' from 10.0.100.22; export file size 1.2GB; destination path: \\10.0.60.77\exports\hist_20250923.tar.gz

rule.description: Linux jump-host: suspicious SSH session and remote command execution

alerts.full_log: 2025-09-23T08:12:02Z sshd: Accepted publickey for 'svc_maint' from 10.0.100.22; subsequent sudo -n commands to scp files to 10.0.50.50 (fanuc controller).

rule.description: EDR: wmiprvse.exe spawned outbound TLS to unknown IP from embedded device

alerts.full_log: 2025-09-23T08:12:11Z Process C:\Windows\SysWOW64\wbem\wmiprvse.exe established TLS connection to 185.62.101.14:443; certificate subject mismatch and external IP flagged in threat intel.
